Uses of PathBuilder in org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.path
 

Methods in org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.path that return PathBuilder
 PathBuilder PathBuilder.color(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color if this path.
 PathBuilder PathBuilder.cubicTo(javax.vecmath.Point2d cp1, javax.vecmath.Point2d cp2, javax.vecmath.Point2d ep)
          Make a cubic curve in the path, with two control points.
 PathBuilder PathBuilder.lineTo(javax.vecmath.Point2d point)
          Make a line in the path, from the last point to the given point.
 PathBuilder PathBuilder.moveTo(javax.vecmath.Point2d point)
          Make a move in the path, without drawing anything.
 PathBuilder PathBuilder.quadTo(javax.vecmath.Point2d cp, javax.vecmath.Point2d ep)
          Make a quadratic curve in the path, with one control point.
